About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

BIO

Hi, I'm Jeff. I grew up in Delaware and moved to New York City after college to work in financial tech. I've acquired a growing interest in web development and enjoy learning new design patterns and technologies. I enjoy the beach, snowboarding, and Bitcoin.

Capital One

Full Stack Developer March '19 - Present

I currently work in Commercial Credit at Capital One. We utilize modern web technologies to provide cutting edge full stack applications.

Fidessa Corporation June '14 - Feb '18

C++ Developer

Worked on the market access team of a full trading system, focusing primarily on execution management and low latency programming in C++.

University of Delaware

Research Assisstant

Conducted research for the Global Computing Lab, which focused primarily on High Performance Computing. During this time I had exposure to distributed systems development and general-purpose GPU programming.
